name: Myndee Murray
text: Best Pizza Hut ever! I live 30 miles away and will drive to this location every single time I want Pizza Hut! Best staff and super clean restaurant you can really taste the love put into the food made here.

name: Matthew Cloues
text: Pizza Hut has seen better days.  This one is actually still a pretty decent location.  Includes the salad salad bar as expected and offer a lunch buffet as well.  Nothing glaringly wrong with this location but freshness of food can be questionable and inside is decent enough. Ut just doesn't feel all that clean.

name: Robert Leonard
text: This is the best pizza hut in new england.  Always hot and delicious.   The staff are great.

name: Brad Armstrong
text: Disappointed with the taste of the food. Usually love all of Pizza hut pizzas.  I got a pepperoni pizza and cheese bread. Only tasted the saltyness of the Pepperoni's. Couldn't taste the cheese or the sauce. The cheesy bread had very little cheese flavor. The price was very good. The building looked run down.
